org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.errors

Class RestError

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.errors.RestError

  • public class RestError
extends Object
    This class represents a user error encountered during the processing of a request. To create a new Error instance, use the factory method that corresponds to the desired error in the RestErrors factory class. To objectToJson a Error object as a JSON String to be sent back, use the objectToJson method with the desired Error object and Locale. To objectToJson an entire list of errors, use the serializeErrors method instead.
